thongbaochung.huongdanmanghinhchitietvitri: Click 'Add' on the right to add a timed staff for this position. In the list of applications, click on the delete icon to remove the employee from the list, click the image icon on the right to see the registered face or click 'Register' to register the face for the staff who has not been registered before.

thongbaochung.notewifi: Manage wifi list did timekeeping and staff did timekeeping list by location. It is possible to declare multiple locations, each location will be able to add the wifi allowed to timekeeping and the list of staff to be timed.
thongbaochung.noteface: Declaring a location allows the staff to timekeeper and adding an staff to a location allows the staff to timekeeper at that location. Staff will register a face sample once, when they arrive at a place where timekeeping is allowed, they will perform time attendance in / out using the application's face recognition.
thongbaochung.nhanvagiudechoncachchamcongkhac: Press and hold to choose another timekeeping method
thongbaochung.vuilongbatvitridelaythongtinwifichamcong: Please enable location to get wifi information - timekeeping
thongbaochung.quagiotaocuochopnenkhongthehuycuochop: The meeting time is over, so it's impossible to cancel the meeting
thongbaochung.banmuonxoanhannaykhoiduankhong: Do you want to remove this tag from the project?
thongbaochung.thongbaogpsgia: We suspect that you use location simulator/simulator software, so this function is not possible!
thongbaochung.vuilongbatgpsdethuchienchucnangnay: Please enable gps for this function
thongbaochung.thietbikhongduocchophepchamcongbangwifi: Device is not allowed to timekeeping by wifi
thongbaochung.thongbaochamcongwifichichophepmotthietbi: Timekeeping by wifi only allows 1 registered device to be allowed to timekeeping. You have registered timekeeping on another device, so you cannot timekeeping with this device. To change the time attendance device, you contact the system manager to cancel the registered device, then you reopen the application to enter the timekeeping using wifi and click "Register timekeeping device" to be able to do timekeeping with this device.
thongbaochung.thongbaochamcongwifibanchuadangkythietbi: Timekeeping by wifi only allows 1 registered device to be allowed to timekeeping. You have not registered any devices. Click “Register this device” and use this device for wifi timekeeping. You will not be able to manually change timekeeping using another device. When there is a need to change, you contact the system manager to delete the registered device, then you re-register it with a new device.
thongbaochung.huongdanchamcongwifi: Connect the device to the wifi that is allowed to timekeeping -> click checkin/checkout for timekeeping in/out. See the list of wifi allowed time attendance below.
thongbaochung.thongbaobanchuaduocthemvaodanhsachchamco: You have not been added to the wifi timekeeping list in any location. In order to be able to timekeeping by wifi, please contact the system manager to be added to the list of wifi timekeeping at authorized locations.
thongbaochung.ghichuchitietnhanvienapdungwifichamcongv: Employees can only use registered devices for timekeeping using wifi. To change another device, you click "Cancel this device", then the employee will use the new device and re-register the time attendance device. After registering a new device, employees use the new device to perform time attendance using wifi.
thongbaochung.motathemduan: The project can be a real project, or simply the name of a list that you want to group tasks together for the purposes of management, statistics, .. Each task must belong to a project. specifically. To start creating your project click the "Add Project" button above to create your first project. After entering the project name you need to select the project members. Task in a project can only be assigned to members of that project.
thongbaochung.noidungquyencuocgoi: The app needs call permission to make the call function in the app
thongbaochung.huongdanBSSID: Connect your phone to wifi want to allow timekeeping, press the current BSSID to get the wifi address
thongbaochung.huongdanNVAD:
- Only employees on the list are allowed to timekeeping using wifi at this location. Add employees who are allowed to timekeeping to the list or remove employees who are no longer applicable. Employees need to connect to one of the wifis in the wifi list above to timekeeping.
- Employees are only allowed to clock in using wifi on a single device (register the device when registering for the first time). 
- If the employee changes their phone, you need to select that employee in the list above and click Cancel device to have the employee re-register the new device
thongbaochung.huongdanwifiduocchamcong: List of wifi at location. Employees will connect to one of the wifis in the list above to timekeeping. Each location will likely have more than one wifi. Employees who are allowed to timekeeping using wifi at the location can connect to one of the wifis on the list to do timekeeping. Add wifi or delete wifi that no longer exists in the list above.
thongbaochung.huongdanchukytinhcong: For payroll cycles, which cycle your organization applies, you choose that type of cycle to set up and add additional employees to apply. When there is a new employee, that employee will automatically apply the cycle. which period is marked as default
thongbaochung.huongdanngaybatdaucongthang: The starting date of the monthly payroll. If the start date is the 1st, the payroll period will be from the 1st to the end of the month. If it starts from the previous month (for example: 25), the payroll period will be from 25 of the previous month to the 24 of the calculation month
thongbaochung.huongdantudongapdungchonhanvienmoi: When there is a new employee, the employee will be automatically added to this strike
thongbaochung.huongdantudongkhoabancong: If you turn on automatic locking of the time sheet, when the due date comes, the system will automatically lock the time sheet (not allowing to send/approve leave, overtime, timekeeping explanations). You can Lock/Unlock manually in the screen "monthly work sheet
thongbaochung.huongdanngaybatdaucongtuan: Starting date of the week. When creating a weekly payroll, the system will use the starting date to get the starting date of the payroll
thongbaochung.huongdanlamtroncong: Turning off work rounding means that the minute an employee works will count that minute. If rounding is turned on, the system will round according to the settings below
thongbaochung.huongdanlamtrongiolamthem: Turning off rounding of hours means that the amount of overtime an employee works will be counted. If rounding of hours is turned on, the system will round when calculating overtime hours according to the settings below
thongbaochung.huongdancaidatcachlamtroncong: Example 30-minute rounding setting. The minimum number of minutes rounded up is 20. The number of hours the employee works is 7 hours 51 minutes. Thus, the calculated number of working hours will be 7 hours 30 minutes (calculated evenly according to 30 minutes) + 21 minutes (remainder after calculating evenly according to 30 minutes). 21 is greater than 20 (the minimum number of minutes to round up is 20), so 21 odd minutes will be rounded up to 30 minutes. So in this case, total employee work for the day = 7 hours 30 minutes + 30 minutes = 8 hours
thongbaochung.huongdancaidatcachlamtronsogiolamthem:
Example 30-minute rounding setting. The minimum number of minutes rounded up is 20. The number of overtime hours for working employees is 1 hour 51 minutes.
Thus, the calculated overtime hours will be 1 hour 30 minutes (calculated evenly in 30 minutes) + 21 minutes (remaining amount after calculating evenly according to 30 minutes). 21 is greater than 20 (the minimum number of minutes to round up is 20), so the extra 21 minutes will be rounded up to 30 minutes. So in this case, the employee"s total overtime hours = 1 hour 30 minutes + 30 minutes = 2 hours
thongbaochung.huongdanxepca: Enabled shifts will display the number of people assigned to that shift each day on the shift placement screen. Choose the shift display color to help you quickly identify the number of employees working that shift during the day
thongbaochung.motalichlamviec: Weekly work schedule is the regulation of working shifts on days in a week. Based on the list of employees working according to any schedule, the system will automatically assign the corresponding shift of the day to the employee
